title: Homotopy types of 4-manifolds with 3-manifold fundamental groups
abstract: We show that the homotopy type of a 4-manifold $M$ whose fundamental group is a finitely presentable $PD_3$-group $π$ and with $w_1(M)=w_1(π)$ is determined by $π$, $π_2(M)$, $k_1(M)$ and the equivariant intersection pairing $λ_M$.
comment: v2: material on surgery deleted. New \S6
